changes:
Quality of Life: 
• added projectiles during the combat loop
• added sound effects across different effects
• improved sprite initialisation and framework across the game
• player loadouts are now displayed in the challenge scene to tell what you have and your opponent
• added hotkeys (Spacebar/R, T) for rolling dice and ending turns respectively

Unit Balance: 
• Ghost: 
• now has a 10-wave lifespan instead of being on the battlefield permanently until defeated
• Bat: 
• can fly over allied monsters (if it has the opportunity to do so)
 Harpy: 
• can fly over allied monsters (if it has the opportunity to do so)

Minor Changes: 
• improved combat loop so monsters don't often get stuck behind allied monsters
• improved skirmisher behaviour

Bug Fixes: 
• fixed an edge case with force field behaviour causing disruptions across monster movement
• fixed an issue that caused damage amplifier behaviour to not work as intended
• minor fixes and improvements.
Alpha release on Protodice! Let us know what you think about our new game!
